description: Variation of Conditions 6, 7 and 9 of planning permission dated 25 October 2012 (RN: 12/08189/FULL) for the: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 9 February 2012 (RN: 11/11784/FULL) for use of the basement  of 1-2 Bull Inn Court and basement and ground floor of 409 - 410 Strand as a restaurant (Class A3), erection of a 4th floor roof extension and rear extension at 2nd and 3rd floors into a lightwell at 409-410 Strand in connection with the provision of 4 residential flats comprising (1 x 1 bed, 2 x 2 bed and 1 x 3 bed), new shopfront at  409-410 Strand and installation of mechanical plant at roof level and at basement level (Site includes 409-410 Strand and 1-2 Bull Inn Court). NAMELY, to allow the operation of a takeaway and collection service from the restaurant; to allow an ancillary bar and to allow the restaurant premises to open at 08.00 instead of 12.00 daily.
